column5: When we see mrkt is strong or a sector is strong and have confidence in the move than its good to buy ETFs with larger position sizes bc picking stks can be difficult if U dont know them well Right now good potential for Chinese tech to go higher KWEB CWEB R good CWEB can gain more than individual stks make sure U have good plans YY BABA BZUN
Good to get back to Chines good stks and KWEB CWEB YY BABA etc
